name: Multi-Scale Truchet Pattern Pen Plot #927125
description:
This is an application of the principle of Multi-Scale Truchet Patterns (Carlson, 2018), which generates multiscale patterns and yields a large variety of forms. This design is based on a grid with a square base.

This is made with Nodebox, a node-based visual language for generative art. All artworks are unique: based on a random seed value. This is #927125.

This is a ‘plottable artwork’. Which means it can be drawn by a machine: a pen plotter. I am happy to deliver a physical drawing after purchase (international shipping included). Feel free to DM me via twitter.com/floris_de_jonge or instagram.com/dejongefloris/.
